document.full_text: more than half of americans say the u.s. economy is in a recession or a depression despite official data that show a moderate recovery, according to a poll released on thursday.
document.title: most americans say u.s. in recession despite data: poll
lines_and_colors: more than half of americans say the u.s. economy is in a recession or a depression despite official data that show a moderate recovery, according to a poll released on thursday.
